title: Rhode Hurt is moving
content:
[http://www.fodastudio.com/images/rh\_1.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154335/http:/www.fodastudio.com/images/rh_1.gif "http://www.fodastudio.com/images/rh\_1.gif")

Is this EF Alternate Gothic No. Three? It seems pretty close, but EF Alternate Gothic No. Three seems to be a bit taller, i guess he might have squeezed the type a little?

thanks.

 [‹ Collegiate Futuristic Font...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154335/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33926 "Go to previous forum topic") [Liquid type? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154335/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33853 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wolfattack

comments.content: This is [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154335/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0003238), another font by Morris Fuller Benton, designer of the Alt Gothics.
